info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Color Trend 2024/25 Ascension is an invitation to live with intention… to create the connections to ourselves, to each other, and to the planet that nurtures us. With these 24 paint colors, we invite you to create a living space that will nurture you and inspire you to manifest a world which reveals your very own magic. AWAKENING, ALCHEMY, ARTISTRY, and ABUNDANCE
